text: Moshi anata gataga, ryonin no hakyoku o osorerunaraba, otoko no ichizoku kara hitori no chotei-sha o, mata on'na no ichizoku karamo hitori no chotei-sha o age nasai. Ryonin ga moshi wakai o nozomunaraba, arra wa ryonin no ma o yuwa sa reyou. Hontoni arra wa, zenchi ni shite nanigoto ni mo tsugyo shite ora reru
